name: A heavy horned barbute
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than average.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
It increases the users cold resistance adequately.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
